cast.overview: An ambitious carnival man with a talent for manipulating people with a few well-chosen words hooks up with a female psychologist who is even more dangerous than he is.
cast.title: Nightmare Alley

details.biography: Will Conlon is a Canadian born actor, writer, director and comedian who has been performing for over twenty years. After studying animation in college, he took to the stage as a stand up comedian for a decade. He decided to spread his acting wings as well and has appeared in several television series such as Clarice, American Gods, Designated Survivor, Murdoch Mysteries and Rookie Blue. Also the Guillermo Del Toro Film "Nightmare Alley." He also released a podcast called "Doing It With Will Conlon" in which he has conversations with artists of all kind who have dedicated their lives to the pursuit of their passion.
details.name: Will Conlon
